\begin{frame}[t,fragile]
\frametitle{生成字幕实战}
\begin{itemize}
\item \url{https://github.com/k2-fsa/sherpa-onnx/blob/master/python-api-examples/generate-subtitles.py}
\end{itemize}
\begin{lstlisting}[basicstyle={\tiny},language={bash}]
./python-api-examples/generate-subtitles.py  \
  --silero-vad-model=./silero_vad.onnx \
  --tokens=./sherpa-onnx-sense-voice-zh-en-ja-ko-yue-2024-07-17/tokens.txt \
  --sense-voice=./sherpa-onnx-sense-voice-zh-en-ja-ko-yue-2024-07-17/model.int8.onnx \
  /Users/fangjun/asr-course/demo-1-subtitles/lei-jun.wav
\end{lstlisting}
